title: Manohari Kundan & Emerald Kangan - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Emeralds (Panachalu). Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning kangan showcases the traditional Kundan setting, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The vibrant emeralds are seamlessly integrated with uncut Polki diamonds. The openwork design adds a contemporary touch to this classic design. The setting is a traditional pacheli setting.
occasions: and special family functions (Kutumba karyalu). Also a perfect statement piece for modern celebrations and parties.
description: This Kangan represents a blend of South Indian heritage and modern elegance. The use of genuine Kundan Polki diamonds and natural emeralds ensures exceptional quality and value. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees long-lasting shine. It's a treasured heirloom to be passed down through generations, symbolizing prosperity and grace.
